i_light_dark_rule.text_template: Verify that all light sources are disabled. Light is the enemy of the Dark Start.

i_light_on_6h_for_plants.text_template: **Lights ON.** Set your lights to **6 hours daily**. Your plants need energy to consume the ammonia. Without light, they will starve and rot, causing an ammonia spike.

i_light_ramp_strategy.text_template: Strategy: **Start Lights Low.** We will set your lights to **50–60% intensity initially. Your plants are currently in transplant shock and growing roots, not leaves. If you blast them with 100% light now, they can't use it, but **Algae** can. We will ramp up the power slowly over the next 6 weeks. Increase intensity a little each week; if algae appears, pause the ramp until the tank stabilizes.

i_light_turn_on_guidance.text_template: Turn on your lights! We start with a short duration and **50% intensity** to prevent algae shock while the ecosystem settles.

t_light_ramp_weekly.text_template: Increase Light Intensity by 5–10% every week.
